name: Mathews Bowhunting
overview: Are you game? If you are, then you better make a run for it. If you are a hunter, though, grab your Wii Remote as you go on a bow hunting expedition through North America. Ready your shot and calm your breath before firing at animals of all sizes including deer, elk, bears, ducks, squirrels, and more. Attract your prey with various animal calls and scents. Customize your bow and arrow to best suit your hunting style. Stalk the most scenic and popular hunting locations in the United States in three thrilling modes: Classic Hunt Mode, Arcade Mode, and Target Practice.
